(Program 
  (Statement 
    (ExpressionStatement 
      (Expression 
        (BinaryExpression 
          (Token) 
          (Expression 
            (BinaryExpression 
              (Token) 
              (Expression 
                (Identifier "i")) 
              (Expression 
                (BinaryExpression 
                  (Token) 
                  (Expression 
                    (Identifier "j")) 
                  (Expression 
                    (Number "2")))))) 
          (Expression 
            (BinaryExpression 
              (Token) 
              (Expression 
                (Identifier "j")) 
              (Expression 
                (Number "4")))))))))
